Summary Note:
Alma Laura Mikkelsen and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
With a career spanning nearly 30 years, Alma Laura Mikkelsen has established herself as a key player in the industry.

Family Background: Alma Laura Mikkelsen is currently widowed. Her children are named Amanda, MÃ¸ller and Rasmussen.
Education Background:
In 1991, Alma graduated from Odense Katedralskole with a secondary school diploma.
Alma graduated from International Business Academy (IBA) in 1994, completing her higher education.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 30 years, Alma Laura Mikkelsen has established herself as a key player in the industry.
Alma Laura Mikkelsen began her professional journey as a Plant Manager at Rockwool International A/S in 1995, laying the foundation for future success.
In 1996, she moved to FLSmidth & Co. A/S to work as a Operations Director, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
At FLSmidth & Co. A/S, she worked as a CEO from 1999 to 2004, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
In 2005, she transitioned to FLSmidth & Co. A/S to take on the position of Chairman, capitalizing on her expertise to propel business growth.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 8610000 DKK from her earnings at all companies.
She owns 3 exceptional properties: townhouse located in Varde, valued at approximately 1,210,000.00 DKK, villa located in Silkeborg, valued at approximately 1,810,000.00 DKK, house located in Greve, valued at approximately 2,340,000.00 DKK. This impressive collection showcases her flair for luxury living and investment prowess, with a notable presence in Greve, Silkeborg and Varde.
In 2008, she received an inheritance of 19790000 DKK from her late grandfather, who was a prominent Real Estate Developer, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: In summary, Alma has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
